question: You are having a graduation party next Sunday evening. You have invited over 25 people to celebrate in your garden, which may continue late into the night.Write a letter to the Chairman of the Housing Society. In your letter:Explain what will be happeningOffer your apologies in advanceInvite him to join the celebration
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about the party which is going to be held on Saturday. I am seeking permission to celebrate the moments with my friends.

I have invited my college friends to participate in these memorable moments of my life. I have arranged a music band, food and drinks to share with my peers. This party will last after midnight. They will be loud music and noise around in the society.

I am really sorry about it because after a long time we got an opportunity to cherish these moments. We are very excited to pursue a master's education in the future. We do not want to miss this opportunity.
I cordially invite you and your family to this special occasion of my life. Please be a part of it. Your presence will be highly appreciated.
I would be awaiting  a positive reply from your end.
